original: <color=#FFE787>使用限制：</color><color=#ccffcc>所有場合皆可使用</color>對我方<color=#ccffcc>5</color>名武將隨機提升<color=#ccffcc>4</color>種狀態。<color=#FFE787>爆擊率</color> & <color=#FFE787>抗性：</color> <color=#ccffcc>+20%</color>  <color=#FFE787>武力智力：</color> <color=#ccffcc>+$Status_Str(4923)@</color> 點<color=#FFE787>鎖血根性：</color>維持 <color=#ccffcc>1</color> 點體力，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4959)@</color> 秒並對敵方<color=#ccffcc>5</color>名武將隨機造成<color=#ccffcc>8</color>種異常狀態。<color=#FFE787>暈眩：</color>造成暈眩，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4953)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>盲目：</color><color=#ccffcc>-45%</color> 命中率，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4950)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>沉默：</color>無法使用招式，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4941)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>緩速：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4947)@</color> 點移動速度，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4947)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>中毒：</color>每秒 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4944)@</color> 點體力，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4944)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>爆擊率</color> & <color=#FFE787>抗性：</color> <color=#ccffcc>-20%</color>  <color=#FFE787>武力智力：</color> <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4911)@</color> 點
